title: Righteous Line
summary: The Righteous Line of warships were designed by the Lycentian Federation to be tanky, anti-fighter, supportive in a fleet, and generally defensive. They are shield-based, meaning they counter pirate NPCs and kinetic weaponry. They have a turret agility bonus, making it easier to track targets. They have balanced turret placement, giving them equal firepower in every direction.
full_text:
Righteous Line
The Righteous Line of warships were designed by the Lycentian Federation to be tanky, anti-fighter, supportive in a fleet, and generally defensive. They are shield-based, meaning they counter pirate NPCs and kinetic weaponry. They have a turret agility bonus, making it easier to track targets. They have balanced turret placement, giving them equal firepower in every direction.
Other than the starfighters, ship names reference morality and the foundations of democracy.
Interceptor
Fighter
Corvette
Frigate
Destroyer
Cruiser
Battleship
T1
Tetra
Luster
Liberty
Virtue
Justice
Dignity*
Nobility**
T2
Triazo
Lucent
Exotic
*The Dignity is only used by Lycentian NPCs, and is labeled ingame as Lycentian Cruiser, Lycentian Veteran Cruiser, Lycentian Ace Cruiser, or Lycentian Federal Cruiser.
**The Nobility is only used by Lycentian NPCs, and is labeled ingame as Lycentian Federal Battleship.
